name: Three-Tails Evil Good King: All Kings Man
name_original: Three-Tails Evil Good King: All Kings Man
description: This is still a work in progress, for the price of 19.99 you can get free updates till the game, is finish. Play as A spirit force to reform in a strange facility. Most spirits have to fight their way out. You and a group of acquaintances learn of a new way of building bonds. Can you trust the people that say they're your friends or are they using you to find their way out? The game can change in an instead, so the commission is key to understanding this game after playing one route talk to your friends ask them if they did anything different.
